BFUHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 122 Multipurpose Health Worker Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 14, 2025, 12:19 IST
 Baba Farid University of Health Science
 122 Jobs |  Posted On : 14-Aug-2025 |  Punjab |  Salary : 15,000 to 35,000




FOLLOW

The Baba Farid University of Health Science (BFUHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 122 Multipurpose Health Worker Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, diploma can apply for the BFUHS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.  Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Punjab.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Multipurpose Health Worker	122	10th pass, Diploma

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 37 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For SC/BC candidates: 05 Years.
For PH candidates: 10 Years.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on 

Written Exam.
Experience.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For all other candidates: Rs. 2,360/- per month.
For SC candidates: Rs. 1,180/-.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 15,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 35,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the BFUHS Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the BFUHS Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	13-08-2025
Closing date	02-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
